QuestData.Title: Shatter the Orbs!
QuestData.Description: They're... bleeding the prisoners... putting the blood... in those globes.$B$B<Grumm's eyes close momentarily and he leans his head back.>$B$BThe blood... taken up to necropolis... to feed blood prince...$B$B<Grumm gasps for breath.>$B$BP-promise... you'll... destroy blood... globes... bring word... to Junek.$B$B<The snow tracker collapses into unconsciousness.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy 5 Blood Globes and report to Snow Tracker Junek at Taunka'le Village.
QuestData.RewardText: I feared they might've captured Grumm, but I never thought they'd do such horrific things to him. I've never seen a warrior survive a losing battle with the Scourge.$b$bThank you for bringing word of his fate, $n. He was a mighty warrior and we will remember him as such.
